html:
TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN

I hereby certify that the person named {{doc.employee_name}} was employed by our company, {{doc.company}}, during the period starting from {{doc.date_of_joining}}. to {{doc.relieving_date}}

{{doc.feedback}}

Anyway, all of us wish his/her the best in his/her career path and future and would like to thank him/her for his/her excellent contribution.
name: Experience Letter

html:
OL/{{doc.name}}
{{doc.offer_date}}

{{doc.salutation}}.{{doc.applicant_name}}
{{doc.address_line_1}}
{{doc.address_line_2}}
{{doc.city}}- {{doc.postal_code}}
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}}

Further to your offer, we are pleased to inform you that you are hereby appointed as “{{doc.designation}}" at {{doc.company}} as per terms and conditions discussed and agreed upon as under :

{% for raw in doc.offer_terms -%}

{{raw.idx}}.{{raw.value}}

{%endfor-%}

Please return the duplicate copy of this letter duly signed in token of acceptance of the terms and conditions of employment within seven days of you receiving this letter.

Please note that this offer stands valid 30 days from the date of offer, failing which this offer will stand withdrawn and canceled, unless notified in writing by you and accepted by the management of Company.

Wishing you all the best and look forward to a long and mutually rewarding association.


Yours faithfully,

For {{doc.company}},


HR Manager

ENDORSEMENT

I hereby confirm that, I have read and understand the above terms and conditions of employment and hereby signify acceptance of the same
name: Offer Letter_Custom

html:
Date:{{doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}}
TO

{{doc.employee_name}}

Subject: Relieving Letter

Dear {{doc.employee_name}}

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your resignation letter dated {{ doc.get_formatted("resignation_letter_date")}}
.

While accepting the same, we thank you very much for the close association with you had with us during the tenure from {{ doc.get_formatted("date_of_joining")}} to {{ doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}}
.

You have been relieved from your service with effect from the closing working hours of {{ doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}}
.

We wish you all the best in your future career
.


Yours Sincerely,

For {{doc.company}}


HR Manager
Date:{{doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}}
TO

{{doc.employee_name}}

Subject: Experience Letter

Dear {{doc.employee_name}}

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your resignation letter dated {{ doc.get_formatted("resignation_letter_date")}} While accepting the same, we thank you very much for the close association with you had with us during the tenure from {{ doc.get_formatted("date_of_joining")}} to {{ doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}} as a {{doc.designation}}
.

You have been relieved from your service with effect from the closing working hours of {{ doc.get_formatted("relieving_date")}} Your last compensation with {{doc.company}} was {{doc.get_formatted("annual_ctc")}} INR per year.
.

We wish you all the best in your future career
.


Yours Sincerely,

For {{doc.company}}


HR Manager
name: Relieving Document

name: Credit Note

html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Offer Letter
